title: Font to go with Brighton Light
content:
Hi,

I’ve designed a wordmark using Brighton Light for a design company - looking for a fresh, clear sans to sit with it, for body text, titles etc.

Any suggestions?

Thanks...

comments.content:
Rotis might work, if it’s not too contemporary. Or Kabel. But it might be too decorative..

Can you post the wordmark?

2 x 2 = 5

Thanks Henrick, Rotis is the kind of thing I’m after, but I think I’ve overused it already so I’ve kind of gone off it. Kabel I think may be too much and compete with Brighton a bit too much.
